preconditions.precondition: Customer requests to create an account

mainSequence.step: Customer requests to create an account
Portal UI displays Account Creation Form to Customer
Customer submits account details (username, email, password)
Authentication System confirms details are valid
Accounts Database creates a new user account
Portal UI displays Account Creation Success to Customer
Portal UI initiates First-Time Login Sequence
Authentication System requests authentication (login) from Customer
Customer provides credentials to Authentication System
Accounts Database confirms credentials are valid
Authentication System notifies Customer of successful authentication
